scripts.build: bun run build:sw && bun run build:ui
scripts.test: bun run build:sw && npx playwright test
scripts.test:sync: bun run build:sw && npx playwright test tests/sync
scripts.test:bundles: bun run build:sw && npx playwright test tests/bundles
scripts.test:stress: bun run build:sw && npx playwright test tests/stress
scripts.test:uptime: bun run build:sw && npx playwright test tests/uptime
scripts.test:uptime:quick: bun run build:sw && npx playwright test tests/uptime/gradual-load-increase.spec.ts
scripts.test:distributed: NODE_ENV=production bun run build:sw && npx playwright test tests/distributed
scripts.test:distributed:baseline: NODE_ENV=production bun run build:sw && npx playwright test tests/distributed/distributed-stress.spec.ts --grep @baseline
scripts.test:distributed:moderate: NODE_ENV=production bun run build:sw && npx playwright test tests/distributed/distributed-stress.spec.ts --grep @moderate
scripts.test:distributed:heavy: NODE_ENV=production bun run build:sw && npx playwright test tests/distributed/distributed-stress.spec.ts --grep @heavy
scripts.test:distributed:stress: NODE_ENV=production bun run build:sw && npx playwright test tests/distributed/distributed-stress.spec.ts --grep @stress
scripts.test:ui: bun run build:sw && npx playwright test --ui
scripts.test:headed: bun run build:sw && npx playwright test --headed
scripts.test:debug: bun run build:sw && npx playwright test --debug
